summary: HITCH FAILURE.  TRAVELING NORTH ON HWY 61 NEAR CLARKSDALE , MS. MY TOW VEHICLE BROKE FREE FROM MY MOTORHOME.  MY MOTORHOMES HITCH  FAILED SENDING THE CAR OFF THE ROAD AND INTO A FIELD.  WE WERE TRAVELING 65 MOH AT THE TIME OF THE OCCURRENCE.  THANKFULLY NO ONE WAS INJURED.  THE HITCH IS A HIDDEN HITCH MODEL 64 6003.  NOW  I FIND OUT THAT THIS HITCH HAD BEEN RECALLED UNDER CAMPAIGN  06E033000.  THESE HITCHES NEED TO BE TAKEN OFF THE ROAD BEFORE SOMEONE DIES OR IS INJURED.
